title: iFlipbook
description: Create a flipbook asset from a png sequence
longDescription:
Flipbook is an Unreal Engine plugin designed to effortlessly generate flipbook animations from a sequence of PNG images. With its simple interface and features, iFlipbook empowers users to create stunning flipbook animations directly within the Unreal Engine environment.


OVERVIEW


Key Features:


PNG Image Sequence Input: iFlipbook seamlessly integrates with your Unreal Engine project, allowing you to import a sequence of PNG images effortlessly. Simply select the folder images you wish to include in your flipbook animation, and iFlipbook will handle the rest.


Customizable Grid Settings: Tailor your flipbook animation to perfection with customizable grid settings. Adjust the number of columns and rows to precisely control the layout of your animation. Whether you're creating a simple flipbook or a complex sequence, iFlipbook offers the flexibility you need.


High Resolution Support: iFlipbook supports ultra-high resolutions of up to 16,000 pixels, ensuring that your flipbook animations look crisp and vibrant.


Preview: Preview your flipbook animation within the Unreal Engine editor. Instantly visualize changes to grid settings, tile size, and image sequence, allowing for seamless iteration and refinement of your animation.


Export as Texture2D Asset: Once you're satisfied with your flipbook animation, export it as a Texture2D asset directly from iFlipbook. Seamlessly integrate your animation into your Unreal Engine project, ready for use in-game environments, cutscenes, and more.


How It Works:


1. Import your PNG image sequence into iFlipbook.

2. Customize grid settings, including columns, rows, and tile size.

3. Preview your flipbook animation.

4. Fine-tune settings until you achieve your desired result.

5. Export your flipbook animation as a Texture2D asset for seamless integration into your project.

With iFlipbook, creating stunning flipbook animations in Unreal Engine has never been easier. Unlock your creativity and bring your ideas to life with this simple and versatile plugin.
